dashboardQueries.name: ed23fdcd-6e35-4e8f-b52f-1bb068739116
dashboardQueries.query:
metadata.vendor_name="Corelight"
metadata.product_event_type = "conn" 
observer.hostname!=""
principal.ip!=""
target.ip!=""
$service=about.labels["service"]
$is_broadcast=if(principal.ip="0.0.0.0" OR principal.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="0.0.0.0","true","false")
$service!=""
$is_broadcast!="true"
match:
    principal.ip
outcome:
    $count=count_distinct(metadata.id)
order:
    $count desc 
limit:
    15
